nodes.text: Odnalor Chull was a male Klatooinian who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. In 32 BBY, he was wanted by Kukul the Hutt for stealing ships from Guarja Shipyards on Nal Hutta. He was killed by Bounty hunter Jango Fett who collected the bounty. Prior to his death by Fett, he was seen in Mos Gamos on Tatooine.
The bounty worth 2,000 credits alive and 1,000 dead, depending on the player's decision.
